channel.title: Haunted Places
channel.description: You’ve heard of haunted houses, haunted cemeteries, haunted islands...but do you know how a normal place can become a paranormal minefield? Every haunted place on earth has a frightening, real backstory. Every Thursday, we take you on an audio tour of a new haunted place, and its haunted history! Haunted Places is a Spotify Original from Parcast.

item.title: Introducing: Malicious Moms
item.description: Hear an exclusive clip from the first episode of Parcast Network’s newest collection. From college admissions scandals to “self-defense” ax murders, see how far some women went to help their kids… and how others used motherhood to get away with their misdeeds. Follow Malicious Moms and listen free, only on Spotify! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

But for all its focus on the future, the past still lingers.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
